srcDoc:
The Main Screen is a Tabs widget.

To set the menu options, edit the JSON object in the configMenu. The JSON has the following properties:

  • mainOption: Name of the Category
  • icon: the name of the icon in the flaticon.es cdn
  • subOptions array: the options inside the Category
    • item: Name to be shown
    • icon: the name of the icon in the flaticon.es cdn
    • type: use for different actions (navigation, execute functions, etc)
    • navTo: instruction to be sent to the Appsmith app (e.g., name of the tab to navigate)

You can add as many options as you want.

The widget's style uses the Appsmith CSS API, adapting to the Theme.

Feel free to use it as a template and modify as needed, adding more properties to the objects and customizing the widget.
